translation.en: [radio DJ in Zulu] This is DJ Happygal on the morning drive.
translation.it: Un caloroso saluto a tutti voi all'ascolto. Sono DJ Happygal, per lo show del mattino.

translation.en: KZN FM 97.2 is where you'll find us, darlings.
translation.it: Ci trovate sempre sulle frequenze di KZN FM 97.2.

translation.en: [in English] Your daily dose of inspiration and good vibes.
translation.it: La vostra dose quotidiana di ispirazione e allegria.

translation.en: [in Zulu] So, make sure that you get your dancing shoes ready.
translation.it: Correte a indossare le vostre scarpe da ballo, perché vi faremo sudare.

translation.en: If you haven't already signed up, tomorrow is your last chance to enter
translation.it: Se non l'avete già fatto, domani è l'ultimo giorno per iscrivervi

translation.en: the fifth annual Jiva Loxion Street Dance Competition.
translation.it: alla quinta edizione della Jiva Loxion Dance Competition.

translation.en: Three crews from KZN will qualify to go to the Joburg bootcamp for nationals.
translation.it: Solo tre crew si qualificheranno alla finale nazionale di Johannesburg.

translation.en: So show us your Bhenga moves, your pantsula,
translation.it: Sfoderate i vostri passi di bhenga, pantsula, amapiano,

translation.en: your Amapiona, or come with a whole new style.
translation.it: o inventate uno stile tutto vostro.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Four times champs, Makhekhe and the Soweto Cats,
translation.it: I quattro volte campioni Makhekhe e i Soweto Cats sono atterrati in città

translation.en: have touched down for the launch at the eRoyal tonight.
translation.it: I quattro volte campioni Makhekhe e i Soweto Cats sono atterrati in città per la festa-lancio al Royal.

translation.en: And if you are lucky, you might get a glimpse of DJ Sika tonight.
translation.it: E se sarete fortunati, lì stasera potreste vedere DJ Sika.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Come on, boy!
[in Zulu] Hey, guys. You know what it is, we are the Umlazi Pushers!
[in Zulu] Oh, my sister, I'm getting almost 500 likes on this video of ours.
translation.it: Sorellina! Siamo quasi a 500 like con il nostro video.

translation.en: [in English] You're gonna be late for Matrics.
Okay, did you wash my uniform?
Did you wash your uniform?
[in Zulu] Oh, my God! Really?
-[in Zulu] Are you ready, Mom? -Yes.
[sighs] Okay.
[in English] Did you wash your brother's uniform? [in Zulu] Yes, Mom.
translation.it: - Gli hai lavato la divisa? - Sì, mamma.

translation.en: [in English] I'm so proud of him.
My boy is going to be the first one in this family to go to varsity.
translation.it: Mio figlio sarà il primo della famiglia ad andare all'università.

translation.en: [in Zulu] I also could've gone to varsity.
[in English] But somebody had to work, Ntombi.
We all have our different paths in this life.
translation.it: Ognuno ha il suo percorso di vita.

translation.en: I'm just glad you left that nonsense of dancing behind you years ago.
translation.it: Sono felice che tu abbia mollato quella sciocchezza del ballo anni fa.

translation.en: I didn't really have a choice.
-[Ntombi's uncle] Ntombi? -[in Zulu] Yes, Uncle!
Pass me the shifting spanner.
Thank you.
-[in English] Here's your coffee. -This pressure on this tap is so low.
translation.it: - Ecco il caffè. - Non c'è pressione dell'acqua.

translation.en: But you've got this, Uncle, and I've got to go.
translation.it: So che lo riparerai. Io devo andare.

translation.en: I'm not gonna come home after work. I'm gonna see Vuyiswa.
translation.it: Dopo il lavoro, mi vedo con Vuyiswa.

translation.en: Be safe.
[in Zulu] Get all of it.
I love it when you work like this.
-[in English] Want to buy my CD? 10 rand. -[in Zulu] No thanks, brother.
translation.it: - Vuoi comprare il mio CD? Dieci rand. - No, grazie.

translation.en: Bro, give me my change.
You see, my brother, you're weak.
translation.it: Fratello mio, tu sei un debole.

translation.en: Every day this chick passes here. And you just look and say what?
translation.it: Quella passa qui ogni giorno. Tu la guardi e cosa fai? Non fai niente!

translation.en: [in English] You say nothing! Boy.
translation.it: Tu la guardi e cosa fai? Non fai niente!

translation.en: [in Zulu] Take her out, man.
Eat nice things, like kebab.
translation.it: a mangiare qualcosa di buono, tipo un bel kebab.

translation.en: [in English] Bill. Shut up!
[in Zulu] Okay! But keep on looking.
translation.it: Ok! Sai che c'è? Continua a guardare.

translation.en: You'll turn into Google, boy. [laughs]
♪ Ain't nobody living out, yeah… ♪ [radio DJ in Zulu] There have been reports of…
translation.it: E ora, le notizie del mattino.

translation.en: service delivery protest action in Umlazi.
translation.it: È in corso una manifestazione di protesta del settore logistico a Umlazi.

translation.en: Allegations of corruption are mounting against Mayor Gumede.
translation.it: Crescono le accuse di corruzione contro il sindaco Gumede.

translation.en: [man in Zulu] Bloody Mayor. Taking money from us, feeding his pocket.
translation.it: Maledetto sindaco. Ruba i nostri soldi.

translation.en: [radio DJ in English] We have a surprise this morning!
[in Zulu] I'm talking about the founder of the Jiva Loxion Street Dance Competition,
translation.it: Parlo del fondatore della Jiva Loxion Dance Competition.

translation.en: the original, the one and only DJ Sika is in the studio.
translation.it: L'unico e insuperabile DJ Sika è qui in studio con noi.

translation.en: [in English] It is going to be one of the best dance competition in Mzansi, man.
translation.it: È una delle migliori gare di ballo del Sudafrica.

translation.en: -What inspired you? -[in Zulu] First, dance is in my blood.
translation.it: Com'è nata? Ho il ballo nel sangue.

translation.en: Dance is from the township, it's a global trendsetter.
translation.it: È una forma d'arte di periferia che lancia mode nel mondo.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Sister. Sister. Please open the window, it's hot in here.
translation.it: Tesoro. Apri il finestrino. Si muore di caldo.

translation.en: [DJ Sika, in English] The Jiva Loxion competition is about the youth,
translation.it: La Jiva Loxion Competition coinvolge i giovani.

translation.en: that's where the dancing starts.
[in Zulu] Excuse me, driver. Turn up the volume.
translation.it: Scusi, può alzare un po' il volume?

translation.en: [DJ Sika in Zulu] …in the townships.
translation.it: Il ballo nasce in periferia, dai giovani,

translation.en: [in English] It starts with the youth dancing in their bedrooms,
translation.it: Il ballo nasce in periferia, dai giovani, nelle loro camerette, nelle strade,

translation.en: dancing in the streets, dancing at house parties,
translation.it: nelle loro camerette, nelle strade, alle feste, alle fermate dei bus,

translation.en: dancing at local taxi ranks,
translation.it: alle feste, alle fermate dei bus,

translation.en: and no one ever gives them the opportunity to shine. Do you feel me?
translation.it: e nessuno dà mai loro l'opportunità di emergere. - Mi spiego? - Eccome se ti spieghi.

translation.en: [in Zulu] I hear you. I feel you.
translation.it: - Mi spiego? - Eccome se ti spieghi.

translation.en: Yeah.
[DJ Sika in English] The prizes are unreal this year.
Brand sponsorship for your crew for a year.
translation.it: Sponsor di un anno per la crew.

translation.en: A million rand check.
And the title of the best street dance crew in South Africa.
translation.it: E il titolo di migliore crew del Sudafrica.

translation.en: [in Zulu] R1 000 000 is no joke. So do what you must…
translation.it: Un milione di rand è tanto. Mettetecela tutta e lottate per la corona, ragazzi.

translation.en: [in English] And fight for the crown, gents. And of course, ladies.
translation.it: Mettetecela tutta e lottate per la corona, ragazzi. E ovviamente, ragazze.

translation.en: Hey, buddy.
Feeling trapped?
Story of my life.
-Debrah, thank you. -Hmm.
[in Zulu] Tell me, do you hate me?
[in English] Why're you always late, though?
Wait, Debrah, this is impossible.
Timesheet never lies.
You know I'm taking care of my entire family.
translation.it: Sa che devo sfamare una famiglia.

translation.en: Who isn't?
[in Zulu] Listen, everyone is up to here with black tax.
translation.it: Qui siamo tutti nella melma fino al collo per via delle nostre famiglie.

translation.en: [in English] All you need to do is to suck it up, and smile
translation.it: Devi solo ingoiare il rospo e sorridere.

translation.en: 'cause we have a school tour coming up now.
We need to entertain them. Be happy, be happy, be happy, okay.
translation.it: Dobbiamo intrattenerla ed essere felici, ok?

translation.en: -Be happy happy. -[plastic dolphin squeals]
Smile. More like it. Okay.
[Paul] Your show is not doing well. -Fuck! -You need more drama,
translation.it: Il tuo reality non fa ascolti. Serve più dramma,

translation.en: [in Zulu] or else you'll be canceled, finished and that's that.
translation.it: altrimenti verrà cancellato. Ci chiuderanno la baracca.

translation.en: -[in English] Don't you have skeletons? -No.
translation.it: Non hai degli scheletri nell'armadio? - No. - Abuso di droga?

translation.en: -Drug abuse? -Really, P?
translation.it: - No. - Abuso di droga? Davvero, P?

translation.en: Criminal activity, crazy ex-girlfriend? Come on, give me something juicy!
translation.it: Attività criminali, ex fuori di testa? Dammi qualcosa di succoso!

translation.en: Yo! There's this girl I used to date back in high school.
translation.it: - Ehi. - Cosa? Uscivo con una ragazza al liceo.

translation.en: Ahh! Tell me more.
Hot, nice things.
That is it! Let's get her on the show.
Hell no, P. I haven't talked to this girl in seven years.
translation.it: Scordatelo. Non le parlo da sette anni.

translation.en: That's even better. We'll be there, we'll catch the fire with…
translation.it: Ancora meglio. Il pubblico vi vedrà fare scintille.

translation.en: Ruin in. Ya-ya-ya…
This girl could be married for all I know, or living in another country, bro.
translation.it: Potrebbe essere sposata, o essersi trasferita all'estero.

translation.en: You're not the only person with a reality TV show.
translation.it: Non sei l'unico ad avere un reality show tutto suo.

translation.en: You're not the only person. There's Khanyi Mbau, Somizi, Bonang.
translation.it: Non sei l'unico ad avere un reality show tutto suo. C'è Khanyi Mbau, Somizi, Bonang. Sappi una cosa.

translation.en: Let me tell you.
translation.it: C'è Khanyi Mbau, Somizi, Bonang. Sappi una cosa.

translation.en: They're killing you, dawg! You're here, they're here.
translation.it: Ti stanno stracciando! Tu sei qui, loro sono qui.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Come on, king!
Come on, king. G-O-T! Greatest. Come here, man!
translation.it: Andiamo, maestà. Tira fuori la corona. Sei un grande, lo sai.

translation.en: Yes, king! Yes!
-[chanting in English] Season four, four! -Season four, season four, four, four!
That's right!
Mm. [mumbles]
Baby.
[in Zulu] Not today, friend.
-And now? -[in English] Nathi… is in town.
translation.it: Che ti prende? Nathi è in città.

translation.en: -What? -As for what he wants, only God knows.
translation.it: Cosa? A fare cosa, chi lo sa.

translation.en: What, is he entering the competition again?
translation.it: Si iscriverà di nuovo alla gara?

translation.en: He's won it so many times. We get it. Oh, my gosh! Makhekhe, you're so amazing.
translation.it: L'ha vinta così tante volte. Abbiamo capito che è bravo.

translation.en: He doesn't need the cash, he doesn't need the fame.
translation.it: Non gli servono i soldi, né la fama.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Oh, have a break, girl, breathe. Rest.
[in Zulu] Do you think he's going to be at eRoyal tonight?
translation.it: Dici che verrà al Royal stasera?

translation.en: [in English] Probably. I mean, it's the big weekend.
translation.it: È possibile. Insomma, è la festa di lancio.

translation.en: It's the launch, everyone will be there. All your favorites, DJ Sika, the judges.
translation.it: Ci saranno tutti. I DJ, Sika, i giudici.

translation.en: [in Zulu] What really matters, now, is your time.
translation.it: Ciò che conta è che ora è il tuo momento.

translation.en: [in English] For what?
I'm not entering. So.
Okay, maybe you can keep it at that.
translation.it: Ok, se è questo che vuoi.

translation.en: As far as Nathi's concerned, you're probably going to see him tonight.
translation.it: Tornando a Nathi, stasera potresti incrociarlo.

translation.en: What are you gonna say?
[in Zulu] I guess I'll be just honest, and say: listen Nathi, when you--
translation.it: Sarò sincera e dirò: "Ascolta, Nathi, quando tu…

translation.en: [in English] When you disappeared on me, that really broke my heart.
translation.it: Quando sei sparito, mi hai spezzato il cuore".

translation.en: You're not gonna say that.
[in Zulu] You cannot spell imenemene without "men."
translation.it: I maschi vengono al mondo solo per portare guai.

translation.en: [in English] And we don't show men that they hurt us. Right?
translation.it: Non devi mai mostrarti ferita davanti a un uomo.

translation.en: So you're gonna have to give me something else.
Actually, Nathi…
You… are an asshole.
-There we go. -[in Zulu] Asshole and… Nathi… mean the same thing.
[in English] Same WhatsApp group. -[in Zulu] Listen… -Yes.
translation.it: - La sostanza non cambia. - Poi dirò:

translation.en: -…don't forget I know you. -Okay! [in English] Oh, I know you.
translation.it: "Ricordati che so chi sei. Ti conosco.

translation.en: So I can see right through that fake celebrity persona of yours.
translation.it: So chi sei oltre il personaggio TV che ti sei costruito".

translation.en: All right, catfish! Yes!
[in Zulu] Let's not forget that all this dancing of yours,
translation.it: - Sì! - "E non dimentichiamo una cosa: ti ho insegnato io a ballare."

translation.en: you learned it from me.
translation.it: ti ho insegnato io a ballare."

translation.en: -Hit him where it hurts! Hmm! -Hmm!
translation.it: Brava! Colpiscilo dove fa male! Per favore.

translation.en: This calls for a new dress, my friend!
translation.it: Ti servirà un bel vestito nuovo.

translation.en: [in English] A toast to you!
Ooh! Okay.
Boys, I'm going to walk and talk to this girl.
translation.it: Vado a parlare con quella ragazza.

translation.en: [in Zulu] You lost your mind?
If Mr. Ndaba was to see you chatting up that girl,
translation.it: Se il sig. Ndaba ti vedesse provarci con lei,

translation.en: I'm telling you, he'll kill you.
Plus, you don't stand a chance with her.
translation.it: E poi, non hai alcuna possibilità con lei.

translation.en: You don't have the slightest chance, man.
Not a chance. Never!
Guys, guys!
Watch and learn. We'll see about this.
translation.it: - Guardate e imparate. - Staremo a vedere.

translation.en: Only the brave shall conquer.
-Hey, ladies. -Hello.
So, um, are you guys entering the Jiva Loxion Competition?
[in Zulu] No, I thought about it, but I don't have a group, so…
translation.it: Avevo pensato di iscrivermi, ma non ho una crew.

translation.en: -And you? -Yes, obviously.
As you can see the Umlazi Pushers are all together.
You have a whole crew! Where did you learn dancing?
translation.it: Hai una crew! E sapete ballare?

translation.en: -What? -Impossible.
-You underestimate me. -I've never seen you dance.
[in English] Let's do like this.
translation.it: Se ti dimostro che so ballare,

translation.en: If I can prove to you that I can dance, will you…
translation.it: Se ti dimostro che so ballare, mi dai il tuo numero?

translation.en: give me your number?
[in Zulu] I'll think about it.
Show me what you've got. [in English] All right.
translation.it: - Fammi vedere cosa sai fare. - Va bene.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Now that you've seen my moves, are you going to give me your number?
translation.it: Ora che hai visto di cosa sono capace, mi dai il tuo numero o no?

translation.en: Well, you can dance. Maybe I'll see you at the competition.
translation.it: Beh, sai ballare. Magari ci vediamo alla gara.

translation.en: Who's this now?
[Nathi in English] Back in my hood.
translation.it: Sono tornato nel mio quartiere, a casa mia.

translation.en: You know, back home. This is where we used to hang around, dance.
translation.it: Sono tornato nel mio quartiere, a casa mia. Qui è dove passavo il tempo a ballare.

translation.en: Get lit back in our high school days, man.
translation.it: Me la spassavo alla grande al liceo.

translation.en: Crazy, crazy, crazy times.
This is where all the cool kids used to hang around.
translation.it: Qui venivano tutti i più fichi.

translation.en: All these youngsters that you see, they're following my footsteps.
translation.it: Tutti i ragazzi che vedete stanno seguendo le mie orme.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah.
Aah, the Romany Cream!
-Hey, Samu! You've grown. -Aah!
You know, I'm a man now.
[in Zulu] Your bike looks great.
translation.it: Hai una moto da paura, amico.

translation.en: -[in English] The swag, dripping leakage. -Of course.
Look, we're also working on our own designs. I'm designing it, the label.
translation.it: Anche noi stiamo lavorando allo stile. Disegniamo i nostri vestiti. Prodotti interamente a Umlazi.

translation.en: 100% Umlazi.
translation.it: Disegniamo i nostri vestiti. Prodotti interamente a Umlazi.

translation.en: You must hook me up when done.
[in Zulu] And your pants? How much are they?
[in English] Let me give you boys a quick summary.
translation.it: Ok, vi faccio un breve elenco.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Look, guys. Made in France for 15 grand.
The shoes, 20k.
translation.it: - Questa è francese. Costa 15.000. - Cosa? - Le scarpe, 20.000. - Ventimila?

translation.en: [in English] Twenty thousand?
But this, this is a scarf. It's a brand ambassador's gift.
translation.it: Questo è un regalo per pubblicizzare il marchio.

translation.en: -Put us on! How do you do it? -Okay.
[in Zulu] Guys, I didn't go to varsity and waste government resources
translation.it: Non sono andato all'università a sprecare risorse dello stato,

translation.en: and waste my parents' money to get an education.
translation.it: o i soldi dei miei genitori per studiare.

translation.en: [in English] I went to the university of life.
-I'm a proud graduate of the streets. -That's all?
translation.it: Mi sono laureato per le strade.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Don't get me wrong, guys. [in English] I'm not saying, don't go to school.
translation.it: Ma non fraintendetemi. Non dico che non dovete studiare.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Go to school, and get the education, guys.
[in English] All I'm saying is education is not the only key to success. Yes.
translation.it: Dico solo che l'istruzione non è l'unica strada per il successo.

translation.en: I want you all to be good role models to the next generation of Skhothane.
translation.it: Siate un esempio per la prossima generazione di ragazzi.

translation.en: -Yes! -[in Zulu] Do not abuse women.
translation.it: Sì. Trattate bene le donne e non drogatevi, ok?

translation.en: [in English] Do not do drugs, yes? [in Zulu] Umlazi Pushers, all about love!
translation.it: Trattate bene le donne e non drogatevi, ok? Diffondete amore.

translation.en: -Love! Skhothanes! -Thank you!
Makhekhe, the man!
[in English] Your sister, how's she doing?
Ah, you know, same old, same old. Still uncool.
translation.it: Lo sai, è sempre la stessa storia. - La solita rompiscatole. - Ma dai!

translation.en: [chuckles] Come on. Can I pass by your house, just to say hi?
translation.it: - La solita rompiscatole. - Ma dai! Posso passare a casa vostra a salutare?

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.
-Can I have her number? -Sure, sure, sure, sure.
translation.it: - Mi lasci il suo numero? - Certo.

translation.en: -Samu. -[in Zulu] Hey, Makhekhe, the man.
-Debrah! -[huffs]
Okay, team abort the mission, the eagle has landed.
translation.it: Fermate le ricerche. L'aquila è nel nido.

translation.en: I found Ntombi. Over and out.
Debrah, I'm so sorry.
I had to go get medication for Mom at the pharmacy.
translation.it: Sono dovuta passare in farmacia per mia madre.

translation.en: That doesn't look like medication to me.
Honestly!
-What's this? -First written warning.
Lunch ended 20 minutes ago, Ntombi. 20 minutes ago!
translation.it: La pausa pranzo è finita 20 minuti fa, Ntombi.

translation.en: At the close, you have toilet duties.
-Debrah, toilets! -Or you want something else?
-No. -Thought so.
Toilets.
[Ntombi] Hey, Vu. I'm on my way. I had the worst day.
translation.it: Ehi, V. Sto arrivando. Ho avuto una giornataccia.

translation.en: Look, I really don't want to go out tonight.
translation.it: Non mi va di uscire stasera.

translation.en: Nathi.
[in Zulu] Energy, girl. Wake up, baby.
[in English] Pick your fighter, babe.
We've got Lisa, Thandiswa, and Sister Bettina!
translation.it: Abbiamo Lisa, Thandiswa e Sorella Bettina!

translation.en: [Ntombi] I told you I'm not going out.
Hey, hey, the liver!
Look, you are beautiful,
you are young, you are Black.
And the world needs to see it. You're going to walk into a club
translation.it: E il mondo deve vederlo. Entrerai in quel locale,

translation.en: with your gorgeous head held high.
And you're going to show Makhekhe
that he didn't break you.
Mm, girl.
Mm, I guess she is nice.
-Pick that! Yeah! -Who is she?
translation.it: - Così mi piaci. Sì! - Vieni qui.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Yes! What's your problem?
Your shirts look like tea packets. Think we're here to drink tea?
translation.it: Sembrate delle bustine di tè con quelle camicie.

translation.en: What's with your pineapple shirts? Is this heaven?
translation.it: E voi dove pensate di andare con quegli ananas?

translation.en: -Is this a farm? -Guys, show us what you've got?
translation.it: Per i campi? Fateci vedere di cosa siete capaci.

translation.en: [in English] Wow! I definitely needed this.
[in Zulu] Hey, hey, guys!
[in English] I am the one and only DJ Happygal!
translation.it: Sono la vostra DJ Happygal. Preparatevi, perché stasera spaccheremo tutto!

translation.en: And you're about to get happy tonight!
That is my song! [laughing]
My two favorite girls!
You look gorgeous, man.
-[in Zulu] Thank you, Ma. -[in English] How's bra Joe?
He's good. [laughs]
Say hi to him for me. I will, definitely.
[in Zulu] Bye, Ma, see you later.
[Menzi in Zulu] Oh, yes! Vuvu, you're hot, girl.
translation.it: Oh, sì! Vuvu, sei uno schianto.

translation.en: [in English] Oh, my God!
What? You're still mad at me?
[in Zulu] Why don't you give him a chance?
translation.it: Perché non gli dai una possibilità?

translation.en: [in English] Who? Menzi? Come on. He doesn't have the Range,
or the Rover.
We'll have what they're having.
[in Zulu] You know?
[in English] There's no man more single than a married one.
translation.it: Non c'è uomo più single di uno sposato.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Indeed, friend. Thirst!
[in English] Why does Zinhle do this here? She's too good for it.
translation.it: Zinhle ne sa qualcosa. È sempre la migliore.

translation.en: Maybe when we were 16, 17,
[in Zulu] but now, forget it.
[man 2 in English] What do we have here? You want a drink?
translation.it: Cosa fai tutta sola? Vuoi da bere?

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
[Ntombi] I'm going to the ladies.
[in Zulu] Wait a sec.
[in English] How about you go back to your table,
translation.it: Perché non mi aspetti al tuo tavolo?

translation.en: and then I'll get myself a drink.
[barman in Zulu] What are you having?
[in English] Water, tap water, okay?
I missed you.
I think this is where you tell me you missed me.
translation.it: Non dici che ti sono mancato anch'io?

translation.en: Oh, come on! Really? After seven years. This is you?
translation.it: Per favore! Dopo sette anni, ti ripresenti così?

translation.en: Just magically making your way back into my friend's life, trying to finesse her.
translation.it: Torni magicamente e ci riprovi con la mia amica?

translation.en: Ha! It's the audacity for me.
V, V, V, you're still feisty as ever.
Look, you can try the superstar act elsewhere.
translation.it: Smettila. Giocati la carta della celebrità altrove.

translation.en: But this woman here, is done with you.
translation.it: Questa donna ha chiuso con te.

translation.en: All right. Okay.
Go and have some self-respect. My gosh! Bye!
translation.it: Abbi un po' di rispetto per te stesso. Ciao.

translation.en: [in Zulu] You suck!
You have no shame.
[in English] Don't make that face. What was that about?
translation.it: Non fare quella faccia. Che ti prende?

translation.en: Babe, I had it under control.
Okay. Have a sip.
You're going to put a beautiful smile on that face.
translation.it: Stampati un bel sorriso in faccia.

translation.en: Chest out, butt out.
translation.it: Petto in fuori, sedere in fuori.

translation.en: -We're going to slay, okay? -That's definitely what we're gonna do.
translation.it: - Spacchiamo tutto. - Sì. È quello che faremo.

translation.en: You had one job.
[in Zulu] You think I joke.
You exaggerate sometimes in all your stories.
translation.it: Esageri sempre quando racconti una storia.

translation.en: They called me on stage, and said I must perform a solo.
translation.it: Mi hanno chiamato sul palco per fare un assolo.

translation.en: -[laughing] -Zila.
[in English] These kids… if they want to know how to dance, they must come and ask me.
translation.it: Se i ragazzi vogliono imparare a ballare, devono venire da me.

translation.en: [Madlamini in Zulu] You're something else.
[Uncle Zo] Let's go to Pinky's.
[Madlamini in English] Every weekend we set up a dance.
translation.it: Ogni fine settimana organizziamo una discoteca qui in giardino.

translation.en: Right here in the garden. I prefer it that way,
translation.it: Ogni fine settimana organizziamo una discoteca qui in giardino. Preferisco così,

translation.en: than rolling myself to some pub with a wheelchair.
translation.it: che entrare in un locale su una sedia a rotelle

translation.en: And have everyone stare at me.
You know what, I'm sorry.
I just pushed it a little bit too far, you know.
translation.it: Forse mi sono spinto troppo oltre.

translation.en: But again… I would have loved to, but hey.
translation.it: Certo, ci sarei andato volentieri, ma…

translation.en: It wouldn't be the same without you.
translation.it: non sarebbe lo stesso senza di te.

translation.en: [sighs] Okay.
[in Zulu] Hey, my baby. Hello, Nolwazi.
-Hello. -[clears throat, chuckles nervously]
[in Zulu] Hey, hey, Nolwazi. It's me, Samu.
[in English] Oh, hi Samu. What's up?
Ah, you know me…
just chilling. Um, actually I had my math textbook out
translation.it: Niente di particolare. In realtà, sono alle prese col libro di matematica e la calcolatrice.

translation.en: and a calculator, you know. Matric can be pretty hard. [chuckling]
translation.it: In realtà, sono alle prese col libro di matematica e la calcolatrice. Sai, l'esame d'ammissione è tosto.

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
Yeah, sure. Um…
I was thinking maybe
we can meet up tomorrow, and you come and study at my house with me.
translation.it: domani potresti venire a studiare da me.

translation.en: Okay, maybe.
[in Zulu] Look, I'm in a bit of a rush.
[in English] I'm going to club eRoyal for the Jiva Loxion launch party.
translation.it: Sto andando alla festa di lancio della Jiva Loxion.

translation.en: [gasps] Say what?
I-- I can meet you there. Yeah, no. We can-- we can meet up.
translation.it: Posso venire anch'io. Ci incontriamo lì.

translation.en: Um, I thought you were busy with school stuff though.
Oh, school can wait. School can wait. I mean, it's a Friday night.
translation.it: Lo studio può aspettare. Insomma, è venerdì sera.

translation.en: Of course, I can come through and come chill with you.
translation.it: Certo che posso venire a stare un po' con te.

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah! Maybe we can dance like we danced at the beach earlier.
translation.it: Certo che posso venire a stare un po' con te. Potremmo ballare come oggi in spiaggia.

translation.en: Okay, cool. I guess I'll see you soon.
translation.it: Ok, va bene. Ci vediamo lì.

translation.en: [chuckles] See you soon.
Yes, boy! [chuckles] Okay.
[in Zulu] Combination is communicating.
-Oh! -I don't think so.
Oh, okay, do you want to see my ID? It's fine, it's fine. Just-- just say it.
translation.it: Ok. Vuoi vedere un documento? Va bene. Bastava chiedere.

translation.en: Ah! I think I left it at home. My own home.
translation.it: Mi sa che l'ho lasciato a casa. La mia casa.

translation.en: The one that I own, because I am 30.
translation.it: Quella che possiedo, perché ho 30 anni.

translation.en: I know your father. What?
Out!
-[in Zulu] Okay fine. Don't touch me. -Go ahead, sir.
[in English] Oh, yes!
-[in Zulu] Hey, Uncle. -Where are you going, boy?
translation.it: - Ehi, zio. - Dove vai, ragazzo mio?

translation.en: I'm going to the Jiva Loxion launch party.
translation.it: Alla festa di lancio della Jiva Loxion.

translation.en: At this hour?
Uncle, you know such parties happen at night.
translation.it: Lo sai che queste feste si fanno di notte.

translation.en: Samukelo, you're doing matric, my boy.
[in English] This is the most important year of your life.
translation.it: È l'anno più importante della tua vita.

translation.en: I think you must study.
[in Zulu] No, Uncle.
Relax about studying. You see… [in English] Education…
translation.it: Rilassati con questa storia. L'istruzione non è l'unica strada per il successo.

translation.en: is not the only key to success.
translation.it: L'istruzione non è l'unica strada per il successo.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Samu, listen to me.
You see… [in English] As long as you live under this roof, [in Zulu] you'll live by my rules.
translation.it: Finché vivrai sotto questo tetto, seguirai le mie regole.

translation.en: [in English] You're going to sit down, and study. Yes?
translation.it: Ora ti siedi e ti metti a studiare. Intesi?

translation.en: This is not even your house.
translation.it: Questa non è neanche casa tua.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Excuse me?
[in English] I thought as much.
Study! Samu.
[in Zulu] Boy, today's the day. Are you making a move?
translation.it: Ehi, amico. È la tua occasione. Farai la tua mossa?

translation.en: No, Mpilo, you know I just came
translation.it: No, Mpilo. Sono venuto per dare il mio CD a DJ Sika,

translation.en: to give DJ Sika my CD, and not here for girls.
translation.it: No, Mpilo. Sono venuto per dare il mio CD a DJ Sika, non per rimorchiare.

translation.en: Boy, there he is. Go and give him your CD, superstar.
translation.it: Eccolo. Vai a dargli il CD. Cosa aspetti?

translation.en: [in English] Maybe today isn't a good time to give him the CD.
translation.it: Forse oggi non è un buon momento.

translation.en: Sika's always talking about you.
translation.it: Sika non fa che parlare di te.

translation.en: Every single night when I was a little boy, I'd sneak into this club.
translation.it: Ogni sera, da ragazzino, entravo di nascosto qui.

translation.en: And guess who'd kick me out.
Every time, you'd sneak back in.
translation.it: E tu ti intrufolavi di nuovo.

translation.en: -[in Zulu] He was naughty, wasn't he? -Hey!
[in English] Thank you for having us. After you, my love.
Hi.
[in Zulu] Out. Now.
[DJ in Zulu] Party people, make some noise, make some noise!
[in Zulu] No, no, no! Are you crazy?
[in English] I want you to do the right thing. And yes, the baby is yours!
translation.it: Devi fare la cosa giusta. E sì, il bambino è tuo.

translation.en: [DJ] The founder and the host of Jiva Loxion Dance Competition!
translation.it: Il fondatore e presentatore della Jiva Loxion Dance Competition!

translation.en: -You can't win, you know my wife! -[DJ Happygal] None other than…
translation.it: Avvicinati a me o a mia moglie,

translation.en: I'll file a restraining order against you.
-…DJ Jika-Jika. -Don't threaten me!
[in Zulu] Do you hear me?
[DJ Happygal in English] I'm talking about Mr. Platinum Live
translation.it: Sto parlando del sig. Lusso in persona.

translation.en: Come on, make some noise! Make some noise!
translation.it: Forza, fatevi sentire! Fate un po' di casino! Sì!

translation.en: Party people, where you at?
[in Zulu] It's good to be here.
[in English] That's what I'm talking about.
Over the next couple of weeks,
you will cry, you will sweat,
and you will dance for your lives.
translation.it: e ballerete per la vostra vita.

translation.en: And in the end,
translation.it: Ma alla fine, solo tre gruppi

translation.en: only three groups will be named the Jiva Loxion champions!
translation.it: Ma alla fine, solo tre gruppi saranno decretati campioni della Jiva Loxion.

translation.en: Now, I will be deciding your fate
alongside the legendary founder of Club eRoyal,
translation.it: insieme alla leggendaria fondatrice del Club Royal,

translation.en: Miss Thandi-D!
And of course not forgetting the queen of SA Jiva,
translation.it: Ci sarà anche la regina sudafricana del ballo.

translation.en: the bodacious, the ever so beautiful, Ms. Bontle Modisele!
translation.it: La prorompente e ammaliante Bontle Modisele!

translation.en: God, she is insane!
I know.
[DJ Sika] Yeah, yeah! As you can see,
translation.it: Sì! Come suo solito, DJ Sika vi offre il meglio del meglio.

translation.en: DJ Sika always provides you with the best of the best,
translation.it: Come suo solito, DJ Sika vi offre il meglio del meglio.

translation.en: and there'll be more surprises as the night goes by. But for now,
translation.it: E ci saranno altre sorprese nel corso della serata. Ma ora, vorrei presentarvi i campioni dell'anno scorso.

translation.en: I'd like to introduce last year's Jiva Loxion champions.
translation.it: Ma ora, vorrei presentarvi i campioni dell'anno scorso.

translation.en: Durban, please make some noise
for Soweto Cats!
[Nathi] Hey, hey, hey.
[in Zulu] I love you, okay.
[in English] When I shine, you shine.
When I win, you're coming with me to Joburg.
translation.it: Vincerò e verrai con me a Johannesburg.

translation.en: [woman] If we call your number, please step forward.
translation.it: Se chiamo il vostro numero, fate un passo avanti.

translation.en: Right. Number four.
And number eight.
Congratulations, you're going on tour!
Thank you, thank you so much! [laughs excitedly, in Zulu] Thank you.
But he stole my life.
No! Sister, you're not going to compare yourself to Makhekhe.
translation.it: No! Non puoi metterti a confronto con Makhekhe.

translation.en: That's supposed to be me on that stage.
translation.it: Dovevo esserci io su quel palco.

translation.en: [woman] Number eight, congratulations, you're going on tour!
translation.it: Il numero otto. Congratulazioni, andrete in tour!

translation.en: Thank you, thank you so much!
[Uncle] Ntombi!
[in Zulu] I'm sorry.
Your father.
Your mother tried to stop him, but he shot himself.
translation.it: Tua madre ha provato a fermarlo. Si è sparato.

translation.en: -Where's Mom? -She's in the hospital.
[in Zulu] Hey. I miss you, Vuvu.
[in English] And I know you miss me too.
translation.it: E so che anch'io ti manco.

translation.en: You know what I don't miss?
I don't miss bailing you out of jail.
-Twice. -Ahh.
Come here.
[in Zulu] I don't miss giving you my money.
translation.it: Non mi manca darti dei soldi.

translation.en: [in English] Your fly-by-night businesses, side hustles!
And I definitely don't miss wondering whether you're alive or not.
translation.it: E non mi manca chiedermi se sei vivo o morto.

translation.en: [in Zulu] You were busy gallivanting with your boys!
translation.it: - Sei sempre in giro con quei delinquenti. - Dai, Vuvu.

translation.en: -No! No! -Vuvu.
translation.it: - Sei sempre in giro con quei delinquenti. - Dai, Vuvu. - Vuvu! - No!

translation.en: [in English] You're a boy. Not a man.
translation.it: Sei un ragazzino, non un uomo.

translation.en: And that's why we're not together.
translation.it: Ed è per questo che non stiamo insieme.

translation.en: -Right? -Huh.
[in Zulu] Move. Move!
[in Zulu] You all right?
Huh?
[in English] Sorry. Do you want to… do you want to dance?
I mean, whatever it is you're feeling right now,
can't be that bad that you can't just dance, just shake it off.
translation.it: non può essere così tragica da toglierti la voglia di ballare.

translation.en: Just dance it off, just dance it off, [in Zulu] what do you think?
translation.it: Ballare fa passare tutto. Che te ne pare?

translation.en: [in English] Please leave me alone.
Please, take me home.
-Now? -[in Zulu] Now!
-[in English] But we just-- -[in Zulu] Vuyiswa, let's go!
[in English] Fine. No one's fighting you!
Oh, my God, it's Makhekhe and the Cats!
translation.it: Oddio, c'è Makhekhe con i Cats!

translation.en: Subtitle translation by Mulalo Mavhungu
